scripts.install:all: npm install && cd user-service && npm install && cd ../post-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:post"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:post"
scripts.db:migrate:all: npm run db:migrate:user && npm run db:migrate:post
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate:undo:all && npm run db:migrate:all && npm run db:seed:all
scripts.db:migrate:undo:all: cd user-service && npm run db:migrate:undo && cd ../post-service && npm run db:migrate:undo
scripts.test:all: npm run test:user && npm run test:post && npm run test:gateway
